SEARCH
Package se.iths.java23.logic

Class BullsAndCows

java.lang.Object
se.iths.java23.logic.BullsAndCows
All Implemented Interfaces:
GuessingGame
public class BullsAndCows extends Object implements GuessingGame
Version:
1.0

BullsAndCows

BullsAndCows implements all the methods in the GuessingGame interface. In this game, the user should guess a 4-digit number with distinct digits.

Author:
Depinder Kaur

  • Method Details

    • generateNumberOrWord

      public String generateNumberOrWord()
      This method returns a 4-digit number of type String. An ArrayList containing digits from 0 to 9 is shuffled. The final number is obtained by concatenating an empty String with digits at the first four indices of the shuffled Arraylist.
      Specified by:
      generateNumberOrWord in interface GuessingGame
      Returns:
      a 4-digit number with different digits and of type String

    • checkResult

      public GuessEvaluation checkResult(String number, String guess)
      This method goes through all the digits in the secret (or generated) number, checks if these digits are present in the guessed number by getting their index. If a digit has the same index as in the secret number, it is counted as a bull, if the digit has a different index, it's a cow. The number of bulls and cows is then saved in the form of a new object of record GuessEvaluation.
      Specified by:
      checkResult in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      number - This is the secret number which is the actual goal for the guessing game.
      guess - This is the number (type String) which is guessed by the player.
      Returns:
      a new object of record GuessEvaluation

    • showResult

      public String showResult(GuessEvaluation guessEvaluation)
      This method returns a String of B (bulls) and C (cows) using the GuessEvaluation argument which has the info about the number of bulls and number of cows. Note that the Bs are concatenated with Cs using a comma.
      Specified by:
      showResult in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      guessEvaluation - It has the number of bulls and cows as its parameters.
      Returns:
      A String of Bs (i.e. bulls) and Cs (i.e. cows)

    • isFinished

      public boolean isFinished(String guessResult)
      Returns a boolean depending upon whether the given argument matches the final goal (i.e. "BBBB,"). Note that if the argument does not match the final goal, the number of guesses increase by 1.
      Specified by:
      isFinished in interface GuessingGame
      Parameters:
      guessResult - It is a String of Bs and Cs which gets generated depending upon the player's input.
      Returns:
      True only if the given argument matches the final goal i.e. "BBBB," .

    • getNumOfGuesses

      public int getNumOfGuesses()
      This method returns the number of guesses it takes to guess the generated secret number.
      Specified by:
      getNumOfGuesses in interface GuessingGame
